alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 845 PM MST... At 800 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, or 20 miles south of Gila Bend. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds will overspread Highway 85 causing difficult handling conditions along with locally reduced visibilities in blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Far southwest Maricopa County. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 131 and 141. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 6 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
